attributes.action: After series of accidents, we demand a cyclist lane between Thurlby & Bourne
attributes.background: On Tuesday 8th November there was a very serious accident involving a bus and a cyclist! This could have been avoided if there was a cyclist lane, the person is seriously injured! We demand we get this!

rejection.details:
Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition on this issue with South Kesteven District Council using the link below:

http://www.southkesteven.gov.uk/index.aspx?articleid=8459
